txt.en: Make your way through the fort to feed the hungry workers and spread coin to those who have become dispirited with the work and schedules they must maintain.

'Food in their bellies and bolstered spirits. It may seem a small thing, but it is a sliver of hope.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder]. They are good, hard workers. They just are pushed too hard. Once we get through these lean times, I know things will get better. They have to get better.'
Your work is done. Head back to Beliash in Rakhat창b and let him know what you have done.
Tell Beliash you did as he asked
Encourage Rakhat창b's workers with food and coins ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Beliash ensures the fair treatment of the workers at Rakhat창b. He asked you to deliver some extra food to hungry workers and to raise the spirits of dispirited workers in the fort.

'Only a few months freed and already the yoke begins to feel heavy again. Yes, we are free, but the overseer does her best to make certain that we have little of comfort, and no time to enjoy our freedom. The workers suffer for her ill-treatment. Some are being starved, and all are dispirited!\n\n'I managed to get some extra food, and I have a few coins to spare. Could you see that the food is delivered to those that are hungry, and use the money to cheer up those who appear crestfallen?'
